text: (nalku) pavitra tingalugalu mugidaga, a bahudevaradhakarannu kandalli kolliri, avarannu hidiyiri, suttuvariyiri mattu pratiyondu ayakattina sthaladalli avarigagi honcinalliri. Taruvaya, avaru pascattapa pattare, namajhâ€Œannu palisuvavaradare mattu jhakatâ€Œannu pavatisidare, avarige avara dariyannu bittu kodiri. Khanditavagiyu allahanu ksamisuvavanu mattu karunamayiyagiddane
